alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 9:05PM PST until January 03 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph, with gusts 35 to 45 mph, except easterly near Troutdale. Gusts up to 50 mph are possible on exposed hills and ridges in Willamette Valley south of Woodburn. * WHERE...Clark County of southwest Washington, and the Willamette Valley in northwest Oregon. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Spotty power outages likely.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
